get.description: In NSIDC Search and the Arctic Data Explorer, this endpoint is queried whenever the user types into the search terms box, and the returned suggestions are displayed in a dropdown beneath the search terms box. The q parameter and returned JSON follow the specifications of the OpenSearch Suggestions 1.0 extension.
